titleStmt.title: A Continvation of the histories of forreine martyrs from the happy reign of the most renowned Queen Elizabeth, to these times : with sundry relations of those bloudy massacres executed upon the Protestants in the cities of France, in the yeare 1572 : wherevnto are annexed the two famous deliverances of our English nation, the one from the Spanish invasion in 88, the other from the Gunpowder Treason in the yeare 1605 : together with the barbarous cruelties exercised upon the professors of the Gospell in the Valtoline, 1621.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ric. Hearn, for the Company of Stationers,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
